quote: Do not pray for an easy life, pray for the strength to endure a difficult one.   – Bruce Lee
fact: There is a seven letter word in the English language that contains ten words without rearranging any of its letters, "therein": the, there, he, in, rein, her, here, ere, therein, herein.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: Why is the new Kindle screen textured to look like paper? So you feel write at home.
